FuncDef: This optional command configures the MPLS-TP tunnel number of the LSP at the far end node of the MPLS-TP LSP. This command is only allowed for MPLS-TP LSPs. If it is not entered, then the system will take the dest-tunnel-number to be the same as the src-tunnel-num for the LSP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination tunnel number. Values-1 to 61440.

ExtraInfo: Default: The default value is the configured src-tunnel-num.
